name: Fire Truck Rampage
description:
Always Be Happy 😊.

This game is a creative aspect of how you see vertical scroller games. This game was challenging to make and is even more challenging to play. Developing this  required a different perspective of how you feel the controls and how the game interacts with you.

In this game you drive two FireTrucks and are supposed to drive through the trafic and rescue the people in danger.

These heroes need your help to drive the Firetrucks at full speed.

Instruction:-

 The controls are fairly simple Left arrow key for moving the trucks left...and Right arrow key for moving the truck right.

Features:-

  • One control for two Fire Trucks.
  • Two roads with a  psuedo random challanging map.
  • Dramatic music.
  • Beautiful lighting.
  • Responsive and complementing UI.

In the end ... we would like to thank all of you for stopping by and a special thanks to Nikhit sir for providing us this opportunity.

Presented By

KING CREATION STUDIO

Developed By

KESEHET SARTHAK SHARMA

Thank you.
